bibl.title: Order to Deliver: P. Lond. V 1655 Revised.
bibl.note: A very similar order originating from the same two persons is now published as P. Oxy. LXIII, 4373 and comparison with that has enabled improvements to be made to the printed text of the London papyrus. 20 June 364.
REA J.R., Order to Deliver: P. Lond. V 1655 Revised.
145.4 P. Lond. V, 1655 P. Oxy. LXIII, 4373
